abstract: File-sharing company Dropbox will introduce new service aimed at information technology departments of big businesses which will feature improved security.
snippet: Dropbox, the file-sharing service, is hoping to appease information technology departments by introducing a new service.
lead_paragraph: Dropbox, the file-sharing service, is hoping to appease information technology departments by introducing a new service.

headline.main: Dropbox Bids to Find Entry in Businesses
headline.print_headline: Dropbox Bids To Find Entry In Businesses
headline.seo: Dropbox Aims to Solidify Its Place With Businesses
